thread.section_title: Melbourne Watch Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Melbourne Watch Company | melbournewatch.com.au
thread.title: Julia
thread.title_full: Melbourne Watch Company reviewed by Julia

author: Julia
title: Julia
text: I have now dealt twice with Melbourne watches - I received the watches promptly, beautifully packaged with full details, operating instructions, warrantee. As a Melburnian resident interstate, I absolutely love my (women's) Parkville and Collins watches which keep excellent (and beautiful) time - the fine detailing, including casing and watchband,is superb and of good quality. Like the men's watches, the appearance is "conservative quality". - I am just awaiting MWC to decide to produce a few zany coloured, but same quality leather, watchbands, ie RED!! MWC, please let me know when you have one!!
